description.narrative:
This preventive project will allow the communities of these 12 hills of the provinces Makamba, Rutana and Karusi to know more aboutthe various risks of disasters that await them as well as the co-conduct to be held in front of them. Roots and Shoots, will implement the DRR project focusing mainly on prevention in collaboration with local actors.
Under the coordination of the communal platform, Roots and Shoots will carry out all the prevention actions foreseen in this Project .
Indeed, resilience in all these aspects (individual, community, institutional) requires the effective involvement of everyone to enable local communities to be able to copewith hazards and to strengthen their local capacities.
Roots and Shoots, as in its missions, focuses on the protection of the environment and the safeguarding of biodiversity.
Across the country, priority actions include community afforestation on bare hills, afforestation to protect public infrastructure and agro-forestry trees.members and volunteers to stabilize environmental balances. This stabilization concerns not only the reforestation of bare areas, but also the protection of the banks of roads such as the RN3 onthe side of Mvugo in Nyanza Lake, and in the commune Shombo. It’s also aboutprotecting the banks of rivers like Musasa in the province of Rutana. These public infrastructures are of vital importance in the socio-economic life of the country. The effects of differential soil erosion on the 12 hills of the Rutana, Makamba and Karusi provinces profoundly alter the climatology, fauna and flora ofthese regions. Overall goal Contribuer à la protection des bassins versants des collines Kibimba, Mugeni, Mvugo, Mukungu, Kanyange, Rutonganikwa, Shombo, Rusi, Rutana, Mungwa, Nyembuye et Muzye est ménacée Specific objectives • Promote the protection of the watersheds of the twelve hill lakes using cash for work approaches • Promote the protection and stabilization of the hillsides of the action zone • Promote the reinforcement of devices for slowing down the speed of runoff Analysis of major risks in the execution of the Project
Risk prevention, such as disaster management, is a multi-phase process that requires coordination and correlation to be effective.
Indeed, Roots andShoots has already implemented similar DRR projects with Oxfam as well as with other partners.
A thorough analysis of the major risks that would constitute barriers to the smooth running of the Project’ was done to try to mitigate itsimpact in the event of an occurrence.

participating-org.narrative: Roots ans Shoots is an association of Burundian law whose registered office is located in the municipality of Nyanza-Lac of MakambaProvince. The strategic plan aligns with Oxfam Novib's sustainable food agenda as contained in its strategic plan. He hasthe Statutes, the Rules of Procedure and a certificate of municipal legal recognition registered under n ° 1005/306/2017. Roots and Shoots is a local organization working in the field of environmental protection and assistance to poor households. She works throughout Makamba Province and is headquartered in Nyanza-Lac. Its actions are geared towards the reforestation of the bare areas of the Nyanza-Lac Commune since the development of nurseries until the planting of trees. The gender component plays animportant role as girls and women are strongly encouraged to participate in these activities up to the school level. Besides the activities related to the environment, come the activities of assistance to vulnerable households to begin with those who are victims of natural disasters especially climatic hazards. Aid is mainly geared towards supporting education and promoting food security.
